_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The element that brings sentient beings: Those who kill living creatures with those who kill living creatures
Those who steal with those who steal
Those who commit sexual misconduct with those who commit sexual misconduct
Those who lie with those who lie
Those who consume alcoholic drinks that cause negligence with those who consume alcoholic drinks that cause negligence
Those who refrain from certain actions (: Those who refrain from killing living creatures
Those who refrain from sexual misconduct
Those who refrain from consuming alcoholic drinks that cause negligence
